Vamprah::

"That's good idea, Squizzy" said kindly Vamprah and added 
smiling "Thanks for all"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Squizzy::
> 
> Squizzy frowns and thinks for a second. "Well, I'm not sure. I 
think 
> your best bet would be to call DevilDuer. He's got some rank and 
will 
> be able to get you a meeting with Zardus."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Vamprah::
> > 
> > "Thanks, Squizzy, I'll rest a while" she said while she sat "Have 
I 
> > to wait that you come back or have I make personally a meeting 
with 
> > your boss? What do you sugesst?"
